At first I was kind of nervous in buying/using this because I had never used a self-tanner, and this one is known to last longer and not be orange. On first application, I noticed a wonderful difference in my skin tone. From winter white to a lovely golden tone. Not orange.
I followed the instructions, though, and I think that's the main thing. Exfoliate really well and there should not be orange problems, and it should last a week or so.
Hard to straighten the roots and takes too many passes for it to actually be straight. I have curly, thick, coarse hair, so it doesn’t work that well, even on high heat.
They do what they're supposed to do.

These files are fantastic. I really like the fact that they're not etched like any other glass file. They do a great job at filing natural nails without all that ear splitting, teeth hurting, grinding noise other glass files make.

As far as buffing/polishing goes, yes, they do make a naked, natural nail shiny. But unless your nail is free of bumps, humps, divots, etc., it's going to take a long time to shine the nail evenly. What you end up doing is making thin/weak spots in the nail which will cause breaks or cracks as the nail grows out because these files take off a lot of nail. You can get shinier nails quicker with a base coat.

The bristles are super soft, almost like a make-up brush soft. Too soft to clean anything. They were a light gray and got lighter after first use. 6 bristles fell out during first use. I doubt these have any charcoal compared to the deep, black coloring of other brushes.

The toothpaste is an unknown brand from China. I'll try many things, but I ain't trying that.

The description says shaving brush and that's why I bought it. But the brush box says its a Beard Brush. So, I still tried using it as a shaving brush. Big mistake. It was like using a pot & pan scrub brush. I couldn't raise up a lather it's so stiff. But it did a nice job exfoliating my face.

Badger? Don't think so. I have many real badger brushes. This appears to be horse or boar. There might be some goat mixed in, who knows for sure?

If you have multiple kids or travel a lot, these covers are excellent. Well made and very cute. I personally like the dog.

Easy to clean and well made.

It's gentle and cleanses well but I notice that it left a thin slippery residue that cannot be washed off easily. If you have a Clarisonic though it could help get rid of this problem. If not, maybe use a washcloth after rinsing.

"Jeff's Wife" - I've used the white name brand for years and some store brands but not the charcoal ones. These work just as good as the others, although I'm not sure if the charcoal really makes a difference.

The description photos show slits in the strip but I haven't seen them in mine, not a big deal but they do serve a purpose. There is quite a bit of black residue left over (there's also residue left over when using the white ones, the black is just more visible) but it rinses away easily with warm water.

I'm very happy with these.

"Jeff's Wife" - I got these when they were an Add-On Item for $3.99, definitely worth the price. The stamper works great, I didn't even wash it first (even though you should always wash new stampers before first use), and it's slightly (I do mean slightly) softer then other clear stampers I own.

If you're new to stamping or not familiar with clear stampers, they are more delicate than opaque ones and tear easily, so be gentle with it. Wash it with dish soap & warm water, dry with a paper towel and clean it with a lint roller or tape. Never buff it or use acetone, you'll make it cloudy defeating the purpose of a clear stamper. When picking up, ROLL GENTLY over the image if you apply too much pressure it won't pick up. When applying the image to the nail press straight down (again, with GENTLE pressure) and rock side to side or roll from side to side. Don't push the tip of the nail into it, it will tear.

All the plates stamp great, I didn't swatch every image, although plates 29 & 41 have shallow etching (in my experience this is normal for BP plates) so the thinner scraper is a nice addition. It's not as thin as the 0.5mm and not a thick as the 1mm ones I own, I'd say it's 0.75mm (I didn't get out the calipers). There are different size images, a little for every nail size. But I do wish the water marble designs were bigger, I'm not a Water Marble Witch yet. Plate 52 is great for lead lighting or Sharpie water coloring.

The stamping guide works like it's supposed to, I've added a photo to show how it's used just in case it's confusing. I have a set of 4 templates from another brand already, there's not much difference in size or thickness of the metal but the designs are different. The edges aren't finished, like a plate with no backing, but I don't think it would cause anyone to slice their finger open unless you're being extremely careless.

All in all a great set.

"Jeff's Wife" - This is not true to color, it dries quite a bit darker, as you can see from the pic, but since I only use it for nail art I don't care but some of you might. I bought the pink back in Feb. 2015, still using it just got tired of the color, and this one seems slightly less opaque but maybe it's because that one is pink on pale skin but a second coat fixes the opacity, (only 1 coat in the pic). It may leave a few specks of the shimmer on your skin when you peel it off but they wipe away effortlessly.

If you're new to nail art and want to use this for that, I do suggest you transfer some to an empty polish bottle (cleaned with acetone or brand new doesn't matter) using a syringe with some sort of tip, an eye dropper or even a straw, this will keep the large bottle from drying out. This 4 oz bottle will last you a very long time, I still have about half the bottle I bought in Feb. 2015, and costs a fraction of the price as those other brands marketed specifically for nail art.

"Jeff's Wife"- These are so good! I only wish I had the original versions to compare. I've only heard negative things about the original stamping polishes from BM so I don't own any, I've only used MdU. But when BM reformulated their stamping polishes I gave them a try and I now own all the new collections so I gave these a try too. Boy am I glad I did. These DID NOT DISAPPOINT! I don't own white stamping polish, I use Sinful Colors Snow Me White that has been open for 3 days, it works but it's still not proper stamping polish. The black I use is MdU, the absolute holy grail of stamping polishes. But I have to say that these are beyond good! This black is comparable to MdU black in every way, except the smell. These have just become my favorite! I don't think I will be ordering from anyone else anymore.

Well built and compact. The charger base works well.

So far the 'waterproofness' has endured splashes, but don't dare try to dump it in a tub of water.

The brushes work well and are replaceable. They should be available on Amazon.

The case is a cool and shiny white patent leather.

"Jeff's Wife"-  Great plates and images that stamp beautifully, as always from Cici & Sisi. I do have two issues. One is that four of the six sleeves are cracked in the corners, like it's old, dried out plastic but I guess it's nothing that some packing tape can't fix. I've never had this issue with the other five sets from them. The other issue is the holder feels a bit more foam like instead of the pleather like the previous ones. But those issues have absolutely nothing to do the stamping ability of the images which, in the end, is the most important thing!

This is my first time using plain silk wrap and I love it!  I started using the self adhesive silk tabs to fix cracks and they worked great so I wrapped all my nails but I had to keep buying them. So I upgraded to this. I'm so glad I did. Yes it takes longer to do my nails now but it's so totally worth it. I wrap my nails every week or so and there's still so much of it left! I will not buy anything else, EVER!

Ideas are limitless with the buffet sections on the three plates. Like the other sets it's difficult to get a clean scrape on some of the corner images. But I do think it helps if you have a very flexible scraper, which I don't.
If you like bay rum, then you'll like Florida Water. If you don't like bay rum after a hot shave then something is wrong with you. Turn in your man card immediately.
It was hard to wear and didn’t stay tight in my head so I returned it.

I didn't see any reviews for these headbands and took a chance. I absolutely LOVE each and every pattern that is in this set. Nothing too crazy, but just enough to add a little extra to an outfit. Would highly recommend these.
Cleaning plaque & flossing.

What a complete waste of money! I was pretty disappointed with this product. It absolutely did nothing for my lashes in terms of lengthening or thickening. I thought I would see some improvement but nothing changed in my lashes at all. That being said, it does seem to condition them pretty well, but not worth the money in my opinion.

I love this! I have Rosacea and the grape seed extract helps broken capillaries in your face which is great! I wash my face in the morning and apply a little bit to my face which helps my foundation go on really smooth!

I discovered this brand through my ipsy bag, and was excited to try a few more best sellers from this brand. I personally love the vitamin c serum and the moisture boost cream. The squalene oil is great to mix with foundations that are a bit too drying without disturbing the coverage level or texture. Overall, great set.

This is more of an oil than a serum in my opinion. It does absorb immediately and does not smell strong like many vitamin C serums. It smells very light and fresh with the slightest citrus scent to it. Great to use for both day and night. Does not contain a sunscreen, so make sure to use one during the day. Overall, highly recommended.

I have very sensitive dry skin, So I was worried that this would over dry and irritate my skin. First of all, it smells amazing. It smells very natural, like greenery and botanicals. This mask has ever so slightly some grit to it. It isn't the scrubbiest of exfoliating masks. The clay doesn't over dry your skin. I do not feel like my skin is tight feeling after washing my face. Overall, it feels very luxurious and relaxing. Great weekly skin treat to unwind at home. Highly recommended.

I have used the Farmacy cleansing balm for 3 years and this is the first time I have used another brand. I find this balm very hydrating. It removes waterproof makeup very well, has a very fresh scent and with a bit of water turns into a milky cleanser. It also comes with a scoop for sanitary use. Overall, it is a great cleansing balm at a reasonable price. Highly recommended.

This is great for minimalists or teenagers. Keeps your essentials organized. you can keep makeup brushes and a few cosmetics in it. It also keeps jewelry, hair ties and other small items organized and easy to find. The mirror is removable as well. Very nice size, and can easily be wiped clean when needed. made of a thick plastic, and the holder slots are silicone. The mirror is a glass mirror. Overall, highly recommended.

These are very good nail files. They work very well, and lasts through multiple uses. I have natural nails, and I I find that the two different grits work well with smoothing edges and removing sharp corners of nails after trimming. I was replacing my old files after every use and the sand was flaking off and getting all over my floors. I did not have any problems with these doing that. Overall, it's a very high quality product and I would highly recommend it, especially for professional use.

I use this at night time as a serum before moisturizer. It smells wonderfully first if all. The texture is very thin and lightweight. It sinks into skin quickly. I do recommend wearing sunscreen during the day time as it can make your newer skin photosensitive. Overall, it's a very easy way to apply vitamin C to brighten skin and even skin tone.

These are perfect for on the go and travel. Don't leak and the pads are nicely saturated. Great to keep in makeup bags or even as a stocking stuffer. I don't use perfume everyday, so these last me a while. Nice way to try out a fragrance before committing to a full sized bottle as well. Highly recommended.

This makes hair styling very easy. Looks professional, and comfortable for all day wear. The band itself is kinda fragile so you have to be careful not to bend it too far apart or it might snap. Overall, it's a good product.

I use this to fill with rubbing alcohol to use as hand sanitizer. I clip it to my bag and use the sprayer to disinfect shopping carts as well. Super handy. They sprayer works very well and does not get clogged. Overall, highly recommended. Have filled all of them and given them to family members to utilize as well.

These are real Korean face masks from a great brand. I first discovered this brand from a subscription box and am now hooked. The box contains 10 masks and each are individually wrapped. They have a generous amount of serum in each. Great as a weekend treat at home after a bath. Overall, highly recommended!

This set of scrunchies and sunglasses for a bride and her bridesmaids is silly but fun. The scrunchies are made of a nice satin type fabric. The sunglasses don't actually offer much sun protection, but they are cute.

Overall, I like this powder and feel it is a good product. I have pale skin that can look sallow at times.  I like the pink tone to the shade that I got. The powder is easy to apply with the small puff included, but I prefer to use a soft applicator brush. This powder does have a bit of sparkle in it, which I don't always want, but it adds a nice glow for nighttime use.

I wasn't really sure what dermaplaning involved before I ordered this product. I watched a couple of youtube clips and decided to give it a try. These tools are bladed scrapers that are used to gently scrape away dead skin and tiny hairs to give your face a fresh, clean, healthy look. In the videos I watched, there was a considerable amount of icky skin removed- literally piles of it! My experience has been much less dramatic. A whole face application resulted in just a tiny amount of "dust" to be removed. I applied a bit too much pressure at first and gave myself a little scratch, so do be cautious. These blades are sharp!
I feel that my skin does look brighter and more healthy. Those videos of dermaplaning likely feature models who had been tanning and not washing their faces so the dirt and oil really built up, and skin was ready to peel.
This product removes tiny "peach fuzz" hairs but I also tried it on a small patch of coarser leg hair that I had missed while shaving. It took it off neatly with no irritation.
Takes me back to childhood. I basically used this in lieu of a vapor rub. It really clears the sinuses. And the tingle feels great on achy spots.

This stuff smells like hand sanitizer. It smells like straight rubbing alcohol and has a strange texture where it balls up when you rub it in. When I got to apply it to my sons face he yells that it hurts his eyes, and I tried it too and it's like rubbing alcohol is just evaporating into your eyes. If you do get this use it on arms and legs, then get a separate one for faces. That's kind of a hassle though so I'd just nix it all together and get a kid one that doesn't burn their eyes.

I was also disappointed that it doesn't go on blue and fade. There's really no way to see where it's applied unless it does that weird crumbly thing, in which case I'm not sure if it's spreading onto the skin or just clumping up.

I have short, stubby lashes so I was excited to try this. I ended up being pretty disappointed. At first, I thought the mascara was dried out because it looked like there was nothing on the brush. I have dark lashes so I couldn't see anything go on color-wise. I rubbed my hand on the brush and there was mascara on there, it just really did not thicken or lengthen at all. The bristles are also molded plastic, so they are scratchy and do not work well at distributing product. It's one of the worst designed mascara brushes I've seen. I thought it was old and dried up that's how bad it was. I will not be using or purchasing this mascara again.

Prairie Rose Organics Mint Cocoa Velvet Body Cream is just that - thick, rich & creamy. Seeps into my skin to create a moisture barrier and the scent is heavenly! This has a very “true,” pure blend of cocoa and peppermint. This will make a beautiful gift!

I've already used them all and they work well and feel good on my skin! The set comes with four pieces and a handle. The tools are all made of natural materials: shower bath brush, body massager, dry brush/pumice stone & loofah. The natural boar bristles bath brush is terrific - I can reach everywhere and it feels great on my back. I really jammed the handle on tightly and it didn't come off the brush while I was using it in the shower. Yet, I was able to remove it when I wanted to attach the massager. These can be used with just the attached handle strap, too. The loofah and pumice stone work great on my feet. Good quality, and I love the way they are packaged to make a nice gift box!

My husband and I have both used these. I like the hydration, the hydroxy acid and the feel of these -- I do not find them too abrasive at all. I find them to have a very mild exfoliation and very mild peeling effect. My husband says that his skin tingles after shaving because they have alcohol (this has very little alcohol because it is listed way at the end of a long list of ingredients). So, I like them much more than he does! These pads are embossed with charcoal powder that draws impurities out of the skin and clarify the pores. My skin feels extremely soothed and hydrated after using these!

My favorite soap!

This smells heavenly! I'll get a whiff of sage while reading in my bedroom, even though the bars of soap are in a nearby bathroom. And it is DELIGHTFUL -- like the great outdoors! Invigorating.

I'm using this in the shower as a body scrubber -- it's abrasive, with bits of sage in the soap.

It may seem a bit pricey, but these are large bars of soap.

Love, love, LOVE Pre' De Provence!

I LOVE how this product did give me a beautiful natural glow however, the cost of that flow caused my skin personally to break out. The same ingredients in the moisturizer and this spot corrector is what causes me to break out. So unfortunately this was returned.
I love this eye glitter but these were all dried up and old! They couldn't be used.
These are great!!! They have enough stretch to be useable but still tight enough to hold your hair and return to their shape. The colors are so beautiful! They really do leave no lines in your hair!!

Gel was very hard to work with and the fiberglass sheets were so thick they wouldn’t stay in a curve, they flattened out while curing the gel. Also any gel on the nail side of the fiberglass sheet would not cure right. I don’t know if this was because of the thickness of the sheets or what. Bought these to mend a small split over the quick on my nail plate (instead of using acrylic like I usually do) to keep it together until it grew out and it did not work. Won’t be using these again.
Love! I have terribly short lashes and this definitely built them up more than my typical layering of 3 mascaras.

My skin is really sensitive.

I also don't generally like all-in-one products. You should see my bathroom cabinets. Trying to consolidate, but I get different rashes in different places, and no one thing works for everything.

This is very gentle and did not make my skin or face or scalp break out or rash up at all. It's not super moisturizing, but it wasn't drying, either. The scent is very light, and the cleanser has a little minty/tingly kick. This would have worked for me in my teens or 20s when I couldn't wait to get out of the shower and on with my life.

This is a good moisturizer and plumper for people whose skin is just starting to age. The plumpers are conventional ingredients, but nothing of major concern unless you are allergic.

I did not get lasting results, but my skin is past just starting to age. I wish I'd had something like this at 40.

The NuDerma wand has done a lot for my aging skin. There are a few creams and sera I swear by -> modern science is pretty cool. It used to be that anything topical just sat on your skin doing nothing (except the one with the french name and gazillion dollar price tag - which, btw, you can get much cheaper in the blue german tin plus seaweed serum). Anyhoo - enter the era of home treatments. Thermal machines are great if you have the money, and for less (but still not cheap) you can get these wands that are practically miraculous.

Used correctly and alongside good skincare practices, they can clear acne, minimize lines, and restore an awful lot of tone and some volume to aging skin. They don't work for everyone, but my skin is thin from prednisone use and it's aging, and the NuDerma wand has been great at firming and plumping over time.

Mine came with the red wands, and I wanted to try the blue on my kid's pizza face. Did I mention that these things zap you?

Yeah, that's important. They zap you. You want to get some numbing cream. Anyway, he's never going to let me do this again, but it's too bad because it cleared his skin beautifully. And fast. And no giant pores from popping stuff. And because they are combination wands, I can use them on my skin.

All for a very affordable amount.

Among retinol creams can be a chore. The stuff is what it is, and retinol is good stuff, if you want to turn over your skin cells the way they used to do it for yourself.

This cream has an excellent formula of retinol, moisturizers, and antioxidants. What it also has that many others don't is a pump that keeps air and light from destroying the ingredients. It's 3% retinol, which is pretty strong, so patch test.

Recommend.

These picks use plastic, but very little compared to other floss picks. The floss itself is also very fine, which makes it great for my tight teeth. East to carry. Easy to use. Wish it had no plastic, but that's why I save these for the road, and just use a water flosser at home.

I'm bummed, because this seems to be working (eyelashes are way softer and less brittle), but it gave me a rash on my eyelids. I have lupus, and my skin is really sensitive, so this probably won't happen to you.

This one is easy to use and results are great! I have it for a couple of months now. That is when I decided to do my own nails with gel. My sister-in-law recommended this machine because it was similar to the one that she has. It is not used much because I do my nails every 4-3 weeks. Original drills are good for some applications, but I got a set of diamond drills for Russian manicure. Since then, I never had gel peeling off from the bottom (which was a common problem when I did my nails at the salon) because I clean my cuticles with this machine. I remove old gel with this machine as well. I am a very satisfied customer.
Really liked it and it is didn't lose any stones so far.

I have a lot of facial rollers. The Y shape is my favorite. The gentle suction massage is very relaxing. This one has a nice weight and feels well made. It rolls smoothly and silently. It came in a velvet pouch in a sealed bubble bag. It's competitively priced right now at $13.99 plus an extra 40% off.

I didn't care much for this sleeping mask. It came in an unsealed box. There's a plastic cover under the lid, but there was a mess of cream all around the rim and threads. Maybe it was used? It smells like lotion and salad dressing. It feels like Vaseline on the skin, which is okay for a sleeping mask. It made me feel like it was  certainly locking in moisture, but the next day, I didn't really notice anything different in my skin. I like sleeping masks but don't expect I would order this again. I definitely find it overpriced ($44) for the packaging, experience, and results - or lack thereof.

This came with a foil seal in a bag. It's a very sweet scented gel that feels nice on the skin - like a soft layer/barrier, but unlike other overnight masks I've tried, the effects weren't really apparent once you remove this the next morning. It's currently $12.99.

I used this later in a day, after derma rollering, and I felt it helped soothe my skin. No lingering irritation or redness from the derma roller. I'm not sure if it was this serum alone or how it worked in conjunction with my other skin care products, but my skin felt velvety soft afterwards. I enjoyed the lavender-scented milky texture of this serum. It came in a sealed box. It's affordably priced at $9.99. I would get this again.

I really like Everyday Beauty's Hydrating Instant Mask so was hopeful for this Night Cream, but I wasn't as impressed. It didn't seem to leave my skin quite as velvety soft or last as many hours, yet the Night Cream is more expensive at $38/1 fl oz. The Mask is $22/1.7 fl oz and can be used overnight as often as needed. I use it as the last step in my skincare routine. This cream came in a box, unsealed and simply smells like a cream.

If you love strawberries and/or are seeking a gentle scrub, this is a good choice. The sealed tub also had a plastic cover under the the lid and was boxed. The scrub had a little brown in it like what you might see when fruit starts to rot or in yogurt, but it's dated good until 9/14/2023, so I felt okay using it. The red particles made my husband and I realize we didn't confidently know the color of strawberry seeds, but I think they are. They feel kind of squishy, and the scrub feels more like a creamy moisturizing lotion. It does smell like strawberries and makes skin soft. This is a different scrub that feels gentle. I personally prefer one that feels like it's polishing and cleaning more than moisturizing though. This is currently $12.

The bottle came in a sealed box. It's a light pink gel. The scent is nice but more fruity-rose like you might find in products scented for children. It cleans okay. I don't feel it's worth $16, but I don't think I would buy this one again regardless.

The tube had a foil seal. There is a pineapple scent. You're supposed to massage the gel on dry skin for 2 minutes. As soon as you start, it starts to pill. I feel like most of it immediately dries up and falls off though I'm sure it's grabbing dead skin too. While it's gentle in that it's not using coarse particles, I didn't enjoy the dry rubbing and tugging at my skin. You can only avoid that over 2 minutes by applying a generous amount of gel, but it's a small tube. My skin looked a little brightened afterwards but not as soft and bright as many other exfoliators (scrubs, peels, masks, serums, etc). This is $12.99, which doesn't seem like as great of a value after seeing how much you need to use. I didn't like the application, results, or price enough to reorder this.

I have a lot of orange-gold lip colors because I find them very flattering on me, so I was pretty confident I would like this. The color is beautiful and not too orange. While I like the gold too, the specks of glitter are larger and more obvious than I would like. Some gold is really fine and distributes as an even shimmer across your lips. With this, you can see the glitter speck here, the glitter speck there, the glitter speck falling a little outside your lip line that will probably end up somewhere else on your face. It has more of a youthful, party feel. I agree it's a color reminiscent of sunsets, suited for summer and fall. The case is possibly the most sophisticated I own though. It has a nice weight, and the magnetic closure feels good. It came in a box and in a sealed bag. I don't mind wearing this color, but I wouldn't buy it again. I think I like the case the best, but I'm not convinced the color or feel add up to make it worth $38.

I've used a drugstore pressed powder for years and always gotten compliments, so it's hard to think I need to pay $52. I can't say I was especially impressed by this. HOWEVER, I'm getting to the age where I'm starting to notice my makeup can look dry and accentuate lines I didn't even think I had. I'm not wearing much makeup these days, but based on reviews, I got this with the hope it will work for maturing skin. I can see this also washing you out a bit as another reviewer mentioned. It's white, and even though I'm fair, I felt this needed a very light application. The good news is if such a thin dusting can live up to the reviews, it makes the price a little better. I was surprised how low quality the puff felt. It's very thin and almost felt rough.
Reviews when I ordered this were raving about it. It's not bad, but it's not all that. Many more reviews have been added since then that reflect that.

I needed a brush for my cats because the one I've been using removes almost too much hair and hurts my one cat plus it's uncomfortable to hold. The brushes I've been seeing look flimsy and painful with their wire tips. I liked the rubber tips on this so took the chance. It's working great so far. I can tell it doesn't hurt my cat...although she still doesn't love what's happening. It smoothed their hair without pulling it all out. The bristles kept their shape. The button pushed all the hair up, so I could cleanly and easily pull it all off. It's more comfortable to hold, and the cover is actually helpful to keep the bristles clean and protected from being bent. It's a little large for even my large cats but totally doable. It would definitely work for larger dogs as well. The price is reasonable and considering so many other similar brushes received poor reviews, I'm especially happy with this for the price.

I bought this out of curiosity about foam cleansers and because a reviewer said it smells like coconut. Actually, it smells like citrus pine to me, which makes a lot more sense looking at the pinecones on the package and the fact is says there pine leaf, grapefruit, and citron extracts. It's a nice scent if you like those. Anyway, I'm finding one pump of these foams work for me (maybe I would need more if I was wearing makeup, and I wish I could tell you how well this removes makeup). This spread thicker than other foams I have used so far. It felt like it did a good job cleaning and left my skin soft and fresh. The price is on par with other foam cleansers I've tried. This would last me a long time since I only need one pump, but I'm just as happy with cheaper cleansers with scents I prefer.
It did not do what it said it would

My daughter and I tried the lashes out as soon as we got them.  We wore them when we went out and they were beautiful and natural looking lashes.  We love these and I would definitely buy them again.  They came with a nice eyelash tweezer too!

I gave it four stars, just because the flavor is so strong. Apparently I lean toward blandness, because others I've talked to like it as is.
I won't toss it out. I just rinse more after using it.

This works so good on face and hands and other dry skin areas. It's easy to use and feels so good. It really hydrates your skin. I use it every week. I will be buying more as gifts for my daughters birthdays.

I loved that it came with an assortment of attachments.  There are three settings on the hair dryer; fan, low, and high.  Also it has a cool button.  Using it on low there was more than enough heat to dry my long hair in a short time.  The big attraction is that this takes up very little space in my tiny bathroom.

I bought this to blend my own tea, and I was very impressed with how fresh this was when I opened the package.  I don't know how long this will hold it's freshness.  That will be the determining factor as to whether or not I buy a bag this large again.
GOOD PRODUCT, EASY TO USE!
Great colors and nice metallic shine!  Will rebuy.
Love this product and the price much better than Mugler site!

I was searching for something with Volufiline and found this inexpensive tube. Thought I would take a chance with it being much less expensive than others I found. It was delivered on time and packaged really professional and nice. I couldn’t wait to dab some on my eye areas. I went back to the mirror about 30 minutes later and almost every bit of puffiness was gone. So, I dabbed a little more around the area and much to my surprise, my eye area looked like I just had botox! I have used it going on almost 2 days and have already ordered more of their products. Going to see how the Gold Milk Steam Cream 200g does on my mature skin along with the Pancoat Pop Vita gloss+lipstick+tint works out.
These are Asian companies and made.. Just as the Manufacturer describes - "Cheap and works” . It has a nice soft aroma that goes away quickly as it is put on the skin.
I am shocked that there are not any other reviews for this product...
For the price and quality, so far I am super pleased and would recommend this product to others.

My skin has always been, at best, blotchy, and if I try some kind of coverup, i usually break out.  I'm not sure what led me to this, but I picked this brand because it didn't seem to have any ingredients in it that I needed a chemistry degree to evaluate. Good choice. No, great choice. I have been using it for three or four days, and my skin is obviously clearer, almost not blotchy at all!  This is amazing. (Would it work for you? Only one way to find out. Tty it.)

Shiny hair is nice - I've used a vinegar rinse for years, didn't need it with this shampoo.  However, my scalp itched incessently, and my hair continued to thin.  I think if I kept on using it, I'd have become tonsured.  I have gone back to the recipes in Grow Hair Fast, have made my own shampoo, used it for two days - and no more itch, and increased confidence I won't go bald.
Gets the job done.

I received a sample of this in my IPSY bag, fell in love, then began the hunt for the right shades. This is the best lip stain/ long wear lippie I've ever used. Great pigmentation, smoking the, feels like nothing when wearing, the only truly non-drying lip stain or extended wear lipstick I've ever used. It really does last all day. If going for full coverage make sure to give it a solid 5 minutes to set. The hardest part is finding just the right shade. I ended up scouring YouTube for swatches.  REALLY love and recommend.

Honest, these bottles and jars are great. High quality. I love that a spatula was included for the jars. I wish it was one for each, but really, I love the attention to detail there. I have used these, just got back from a short trip, and they will be going with me to Spain in 2 weeks for holidays. They do what they say they will, easy fill, click dial for the label, squeeze every bit out, no leaks. The zip bag ripped on second use. That was no bother to me,I didn't need it. EXCELLENT seller communication!  After purchase, I received an email to see if I was pleased, wrote back that I was, except for the bag, and described. Seller thanked me for honest input and is looking for a new supplier of more sturdy bags. Kudos to this little shop, I hope they do very well in the big Amazon world. Great customer service. Beyond the quality product, I would go out of my way to do business with this seller again.

My new love- Good bye pouf balls. This is amazing, really feels like it is exfoliating, especially now with my dry itchy winter skin. I love this. Kept one, will be giving the other two away with nice shower stuff as gifts, then will order more for myself. I wish I had of found these years ago.

Adding to previous review- I am finally ordering another 3 pack. I gave away 2 of the first 3 pack as stocking stuffers to family. Now everyone in my family is talking about these and wanting them. *Please note, if you have really sensitive skin (like me) these work great, just remember don't scrub as hard as you would with your everyday pouf ball thing. These do the exfoliating job just great without lots of pressure. Also, mine has held up beautifully. I throw it in the wash and air dry, still looks new. I really love how I can use on back. I know it sounds silly to get this lathered up (hahahaha) over a product, but this is a game changer.

This is a lovely smelling perfume smells just like Juicy! It lasts a very long time just about as long as juicy does and it does not have an over bearing scent like some perfumes it comes in a good sized bottle that will last me for quite a while! Very happy with this purchase will buy again and will also try other scents form Watermark Beauty!

I was fortunate to receive this product at a discounted price during a special promotion to test in exchange for my honest and unbiased review.
The discount has not influenced or impacted my judgement of this product. I take this seriously and include my own opinion and experience with each product I review. I am in no way required by the seller to leave positive remarks about their product. If you have found my product review to be helpful, please thumbs up this review. This will make it easier for others to find this review so they may be helped as well.
I have one in each car, my handbag, by the front door for when I get the mail.  I give them as stocking stuffers.

If you, or your child suffer from skin rashes like eczema, psoriasis, or just have dry skin, this is amazing.  My 15 month old grandson has had ongoing issues with eczema since birth and this is the only thing that has really worked.  We use is everyday and it's just amazing how fast the splotches start to fade away.  Love it!
One was missing the cap. So I can't use that one for anything but my own use, I can't use it for customers.

I have to admit that I don't use the bottles with the crystals although they do look nice. I wanted to try the facial roller. I had another facial roller that I liked but it disappeared so I wanted to see if this one was just as calming and cool.

Good news is that the facial roller in the Rose Quartz Massager Facial Roller with Bottles for Essential Oils is cool and calming. I give it a slight edge over my old one because the rose quartz is pretty. I'm not sure if it is anti-aging because I don't really pay attention to that. If it is having an effect, then great, but for me, the rolling action helps me wind down at the end of the day. The motions are soothing and quartz is cool against the skin. It is easy to clean and it keeps well too. With the two roller bottles, it does make a nice gift set. But this is a set that I'm keeping. Hopefully this one doesn't disappear.

I like this Makeup Sponge Beauty Makeup Sponge Blender Professional Foundation Sponge. It says "Snowflakes" on the plastic box but I don't know if that is the actual brand name. Given the teardrop design, it probably can be used with a powder based item like eye shadow, but I prefer to use it for foundation blending/application. I like how sponges can use a bit of water with the foundation to help with spreading the foundation on the skin and this sponge does a nice job of this. The foundation goes onto the skin so it looks sheer, fresh and polished. It also does a good job of blending so concealer conceals but doesn't appear obvious. I like that is easy to clean and doesn't have the "make up sponge" smell. If anything makes me stop using a make up sponge, it is the rubber-y used smell that it can get, but this sponge doesn't have that smell so I'm glad of that.

Overall, it is a nice makeup tool to have in the make up box. I like it.
Small but works perfectly for mixing foundations and other cosmetics, and useful for travel. I like it!!
Not for me but my son's girlfriend LOVES this product.  The brush shape didn't work well with my fine lashes but she says it works well with hers. She loves both of these mascaras!!

I have fine hair and I was concerned that the boar bristle would pull my hair or get entangled in it.  So far I'm loving this brush - one benefit over others is that the tips are coated which helps keep it from getting tangled.  It is a lightweight brush but seems to be very well made.  I've used brushes before (including boar bristles) and I like this one just fine.  I've only had it a couple of weeks so if anything changes, I'll add to this post.  So far, thought, it seems quality and gives me a perfect curl under on my ends!

Had been using this perm for years when the store quit carrying it. Was glad to find it on Amazon. It is not a strong permanent solution so it rarely burns the hair.  I'm sure you could but it really is good for fine hair. It does have a strong perm solution smell that lasted through the first shampoo, but since it is so good with my hair, it is a small price to pay.  It is important to do a test curl if your hair is a bit longer in order to ensure the bottom curls as much as the top. I didn't time it right last time and the bottom of my hair didn't curl as tightly as the top. A test time would have helped. Still, overall it is an excellent perm for thin delicate hair.

Smells great, feels good. There are no ingredients which are reactive on my sensitive skin. The measured dose and airless pump are super features. Best of all, my muscles are not "twitchy" when I lay down to sleep at night.
I'm a big fan of silk powder as it is so nice for my uber sensitive skin. Happy to have found this as its a great price for silk powder.
This did absolutely nothing for my hair. If anything, it made the static worse. This was a disappointment.
Very pretty comb, using as a bridesmaid accessory. It looks delicate and lovely.
This product is great for mending broken and cracked nails, but it is a little difficult to cut the silk to the right size.

These are not the same size as your standard cotton swab. They have a smell also.  If you plan to use them out of the box think again. The box is so tight it is hard to get the swabs out and to open and closed the box. All of the boxes are in a larger box. We had to tear the larger box to get all the smaller boxes out.  No wear does it say the swab are organic. We will not be buying these again. We will use these for non-ear and body cleaning.  In our opinion it would be helpful to have a container to put these in. Not good for travel in our opinion as the box is flimsy and they are just so difficult to get out especially when the box is full.

These replacement heads were a perfect fit for my rechargeable Oral B toothbrush. The bristles are firm, but not hard, so brushing is thorough but not painful. They're also more resilient than the original brush heads which got bent out shape very quickly. By comparison, these hold up quite well. And the price for all 8 heads is quite reasonable.  There's no reason why I'll ever buy any other replacement heads as long as I can get these.

One of the trials of growing older is a fuzzy face, so I appreciate the gentle way this shaver attacks that fuzz, whether it's soft and peachy, or stiff where the hair has gone white. No nicks, no burn, no discomfort, just a light buzz, and the hair is gone. Sometimes it takes a couple of passes, but it gets the job done.  And I love the light that lets me see more clearly where the hair is or isn't.  Well worth the money in my opinion. Runs on a single AA battery.

A little goes a long way with this foaming cleanser which is probably why you don't get a lot in the bottle. It lathers up nicely, and comes off leaving a slight slickness on my skin like most moisturizing face or body washes. My face felt good after I used it, clean but not tight or dry.

It is awfully pricey for what you get, so I can't tell you to rush right out and get yourself a bottle. I couldn't afford to use it all the time. I note that it comes with instructions on how to reuse the bottle, thereby cutting down on waste. Unfortunately it came wrapped in several layers of paper in a special box, so... Not quite as small a footprint as they're saying.

Nice enough, but not a necessity.

Yes, I do love this product. Not so much for my face because it's probably the most emollient moisturizer I've ever used, and I don't like the feel of anything heavy on my face, particularly during the summer when the humidity is high. But on the rest of my skin? This feels like heaven. As I've gotten older my skin has gone from mixed to quite dry, and this facial moisturizer just ends the flaking and itching, just stops it dead.

I can't say if there's an anti-aging effect going on here since the only place my age shows on my skin is on my face, but if the way my skin feels after applying it is any indication, I'm getting younger by the day. It's a generous 3.4 oz of cream for your money, and you don't need to apply a lot to get the bene fit. So if you have dry skin anywhere on your body, I would say don't hesitate to try this stuff. You may just be happier inside your skin than you have been in a long time.

I have no idea what this stuff is or how it works, but it helps my mouth when it's irritated or when I have a sore in it. I had a canker sore (which I tend to get when I'm sick or stressed) and it healed it up before it grew larger as it usually does. I burnt my tongue on hot tea last week and swished this around my mouth mixed with water a few times, and my tongue was fine the next day. It doesn't heal you up right away, but it seems to make you heal faster. It burns and tingles too, so if you hate that feeling I'd avoid it.
These are becoming scarce. I searched everywhere. Most are flimsy. These are sturdy and attractive at a decent price. I bought oval ones. Get them!
Meh.
They did  not work, came dry. 100 percent waste of money. It is as if somebody tried this item out returned it and than they sent it to me.
Wonderful and beautiful!

For some reason the one I received was WAY lighter than the one I already owned.
It still works but it definitely wasn't the color I expected.
love argan oil for hair and face.  no greasy feeling, feels wonderful
feels nice on the skin.  no greasy feeling.  no smell.  nice moisturizer overall

Excellent product!  Been using it for 3 days and there is a noticeable difference. My beard is soft and the not itchy any more.  I really enjoy the sent smells like I just left the babrber shop.  I will definitely buy this again

Hands down best hair dye ever, and I've tried a bunch of brands. It lasts the longest and has the most vibrant colors.
It smells like cherries and has the consistency of something like cold cream.
For best results I bleach my hair to at least a medium blonde, although it is best practice to bleach as light as you can go. Don't even try it with black hair, it won't show at all.
I wash my hair once a week and the vividness last at least a month if using sulfate-free shampoo and cold water. Thereafter the color starts to fade into a lighter and less saturated tone, but still pretty. Since my hair is damaged by the bleach, the dye stains my hair and it settles to it's final color in about 4 months.
The dye helps smooth out my hair considerably after a damaging bleaching session.
I only wish they had more colors and jared versions since getting it out of the bottle is a pain when you reach the bottom. This stuff also stains your furniture and bedding (dark colors moreso than others)
Attached are photos of my hair freshly dyed shocking blue, and after a few months.
Other pictures include the dyes atomic pink, blue velvet, and fishbowl freshly dyed and after a few months.
I use these as replacements on my Shu Umura curler, it fits alright, not perfectly, with a small gap on both sides.

I love the wide selection of soaps, so many to choose from. The soaps are long lasting but can make you a little dry, which is normal for bar soaps I think. It's a great deal and a good way to sample multiple scents. THe bar is a square about the size of my palm.

Full disclosure, I ordered this for the mascara.  I'd ordered one of the gift sets previously, liked the products but the mascara gas become my go-to.  Not too thick, not too sticky, doesn't flake.  Oh yeah, the lip gloss is nice too, but a little thick for my taste.
This is a very sturdy comb, I use it almost every day with no wear-and-tear to show for it.
good product/service
Works perfectly as intended with no issues!

Wanted a nice comb as i kept losing the $3 ones from the stores. Much smoother and nicer to use, and quite durable so far(i spin it on the loop so it takes quite a few falls). Plus youll want to keep track of it unlike a normal comb

I have used this conditioner 3 times now.  I live in a humid, tropical zone. It works very well - just as well as any other bottled conditioner.  All one has to do is modify and adjust the way one is "accustomed" to applying conditioner.  It will take some getting used to for me.  So far I used a combination of rubbing the bar over my head and running it over the long hair ends placed in my hand.  I am very pleased with it.  The citrus scent is nice, it isn't feminine or masculine, but crisp and light. I will buy it again.
Very greasy! Horrid taste!

These are by far the best of these kind of towels I have ever had!

I have super long hair, and these are long enough so the ends of my hair don't bunch up in the bottom or fall out. The towels themselves are SUPER soft and maintain the softness even after washing. The elastic & button are sewed on well, and hasn't stretched.

I also found they are more absorbent than the other towels I have bought previously. Highly recommend these!!!
Didn't see boosting effects at all. It doesn't even spray, the liquid just dribbles out the sprayer and runs down the side of the bottle. Having a sprayer is completely useless

Hoped product would improve my hair and it does somewhat, but seems a bit heavy on my hair.  Haven't done the 5 min treatment, only 2-3 minutes, when I'm showering, wash my hair, put this stuff in and then continue with my shower, which only takes a few minutes.  It does help hair comb out with no tangling, but can get that with any good conditioner.  I do need to address their sales/customer service actions - received email asking about the product, if I was happy with it, etc, and responded that I hadn't tried it yet, and after trying a few times would leave Amazon review.  In the next couple of weeks I received 3 more emails, which I found annoying.  So I'll say the product was okay, sales follow up was very annoying.

I purchased a 24inch bundle to add to a wig I ordered from a different company. The bundle arrived and was packaged very well. I co-washed it and added it to my wig. I love this hair! It blends very well with my wig too-No difference in quality- 5 stars! I would buy it again.
Seems to work great! Only thing is that the cap won't fit back on once it is taken off which makes the product dry out.

I have never had something make my hair feel as awful as this does. It really feels like glue has been rubbed all through my hair. Awful. The ONLY thing this has going for it is that it smells nice. Otherwise, it's really very bad.

I count Emergen-C among my top ten can't live without products. I have at least one everyday. Not only do they taste great (most of the flavors), they really do make me feel better, healthier and go a long way toward reducing headaches.

The pink lemonade? I was skeptical of it at first but it is REALLY good! My top three favorite Emergen-C flavors are Cranberry, Raspberry and now Pink Lemonade. All very tasty.

Pink Lemonade will now be a regular part of my Emergen-C rotation. Yum!

I was surprised to see so many bad reviews. These were easy for me to install. I got a good, clean cut. After using old and dull blades, these were so much better. I wish it came with a cleaner brush, but after digging around in drawers in the bathroom, one was found.
I use it during daytime without any makeup. It makes my skin look much better and natural.
feels a little cheap in the hand but its nice that it folds and it work perfectly fine. my first UV light for nail and id reccomend it.

These were very cheaply made, but I guess in this situation I got what I paid for.  They discolor very easy and did not cut well at all.  With that being said I need to state that I am use to utilizing professional shears and thinners.  These would probably be ok for home use with the occasional bang trim.
Much ado about an OK product.
I think my skin is beyond redemption from working outside, desert gardening and working inside, housecleaning.  But it does feel nice on the skin and has a delightful fragrance.
I bought this pin for my wife.  The quality is terrible.  The pin fell off the button as soon as we took it out of the package.
I bought this for my 86-year-old mother, she absolutely loves it!!!

I love this bottle!  It is a gorgeous color and sleek feminine design!  Good job BHPC~ I grabbed this body mist because of the bottle and I instantly liked it.  Light musky, earthy scent.  Not floral at all, or clean or citrus.  If you like more oriental fragrances, as I do you'll like this.  Perfect for anytime.  It's a bit like the way more expensive Jean Paul Gaultier, which I have, wear and love!

This is a lovely nice scented light Creme. It reminds me of a French Creme I bought in Paris by Diadermine. The texture is perfect for any skin type. Don’t buy it if fragrance bothers you. I love nice smelling products. Love this rather obscure creme
Very nice but pads are a bit dried up which is weird!
This pulls in digital signals perfectly, and the cut-out in the middle makes for some interesting window decoration.
Great product it smell pretty good and it hydrates the skin
Works fine e I wish it was a little bigger

First off, you shouldn't be shaving anything but your face with this razor. Norelco's older models seem to be heavier and have more powerful motors; this thing is more like those old electric lawnmowers that couldn't cut grass more than 1/2" high. It gives a middling shave on face and neck, but it certainly can't handle the forest around the Great Oak Tree, if you know what I mean. It also won't do armpits or backs or legs very well.

I'd go with an older model that is heavier and seems to have a more powerful motor. You'll need it to clearcut your axillary forest.

I did not purchase this on Amazon, but purchased at a local store because I wanted to physically view it first.  I have a bathroom with a sink under a large window.  There is a small space between the sink and windowsill that is tiled in polished marble subway tile (with almost no grout lines).  This is my children's bathroom and I wanted to give them a mirror to help them with brushing their teeth.  I needed something small that did not require nailing or gluing and that would not break and hurt my children if it fell off.  This item pretty much perfectly fit the bill.  My one worry was that it would not actually stick to the slightly uneven marble tile surface.  I was also a little worried that the image would be warped and ultimately unhelpful.  I have had this now for about a year and it has held up beautifully.  It fits in the space perfectly, has a nice modern and clean look that blends into the slightly grey tone of my marble tile and most importantly, stuck without any problems (make sure to stick to clean DRY surface), even with small fingers poking at it.  NOTE that I cannot really comment on the other reviewers' comments about fogging.  It has never fogged up for us, but our placement doesn't really lend to anything fogging to begin with.
Cute
Spouse swears by this stuff.  Only issue was one of the bottles leaked in transport.  Didn't lose much out of the bottle. Decent deal
It does what it says and my spouse refuses to use anything different. Trust me as a person who gets to hear about it first hand from a person who uses it daily,,, This has got to be good stuff
Best product I have ever used. My blackheads are visibly reduced and it makes my skin feel soft without being dry.

If you are naturally light, don’t waste you money on this. It pulled out all my orange pigment and now I have to figure out how to fix the mess I got my self into. Unfortunately the lesson is don’t trust the reviewers too much because everybody’s hair is different. Just be cautious.

This aftershave as of most Fine aftershaves is cooling and has face skin tightening properties. The scent
is somewhat lacking, very faint in the lavender smell. The lasting of the scent is a couple of hours or
so. I do like the Fine aftershaves and have purchased several different scents. However, this lavender
is NOT what I was expecting in the scent aspect...

These bottles are not your average travel bottles that you find in the .50 cents bin at Wal-Mart. They are made to use. In
my opinion they are not expensive. They are high quality and made very tough. As the old saying "you get what you pay for".
So, if you are looking for a 4oz bottle for travel or use in the bathroom, these are the ticket. Worth every penny.
THEY DO NOT LEAK...

This stuff is about as much a deodorant as an airplane with no wings. Cakes up under your arms, has a faint smell
somewhat like a flavoring extract. The very faint smell sure isn't sandalwood. I surely WOULD NOT recommend to
anybody. Truth is truth, Fact is fact. You have been advised...

UPDATE: unfortunately this product doesn’t seem to last for very long after application... all my nails started popping off within a few hours ☹️

Took a little bit of practice but this kit is great for the price 🙂
Not worth the money

Nice looking nails. Easy instructions and easy to use. Makes acrylic-like nails easy at home. Unlike traditional nails, these wear very well, and don't chip or flake off

In the attached photo I have my nail I've had for over a week, and though my nail is beginning to grow out, the color itself if still holding fast

I purchased these not for their intended purpose.  I use them as a display for all my polish colors.  I glue them to index cards and mark the brand and name/number of the polish so I know exactly which color I want to choose with no guesswork.  They work great for this purpose.

The bottles are a nice size, with plenty of polish to work with!  2 thin coats is all I've need to get full coverage. These are a great variety of neon colors.  So fun to work with!  Great for using as a base for stamping.  If applied correctly as directed I have had the polish last for up to 2 weeks.  This is a great value and I highly recommend this polish.

This soap is great for gifts or yourself!  There are 2 bars nicely wrapped together.  Lavender and peppermint both smell great.  The peppermint has a nice cooling sensation.  They suds nicely and rinse clean with no residue.  Would highly recommend it!!!
These worked great the first three times I sprayed my plants.  Then they broke. Junk.

I have a big fluffy beard. Unfortunately in the winter, it more resembles a brillo pad in texture and I sometimes look like a homeless person.

This oil works well to condition and treat your beard, and the skin underneath. I apply it right out of the shower after towel drying my beard while it is still damp. I use three squirts of oil, placed in my palm, run my hands together and massage into my beard. It keeps my beard soft and supple all day, and treats the skin underneath to stop dryness and itching.

I almost thought of trimming my magnificent beard down because it was so rough, and it was itchy, this is allowing me to continue to grow it.

My beard hair is soft, manageable, and free of knots.

The glass bottle is heavy duty, so you can take it when you travel.

My ONLY complaint is the cost. It's pretty expensive, but I think a bottle would last you 2 months or so, but it's still a pretty hefty price to pay for a soft and manageable beard, free of itchiness.

My wife is a professional hair stylist. She cuts my hair every 2-3 weeks and relies heavily on using electric shears to do so. This unit works very well. It can work plugged in, or with battery, which should give you about 40 minutes of time per charge.

The shears are sharp and do a great job of cutting through my thick hair. The attachments are also very nice. Unlike other units that have 6 or 7 different guards depending on what you want to do. It has a fixed length one, a short variable one, and a long variable one. For my hair she used the short variable one. The settings go from 1/16 of a inch up to about 3/4 inch, and the long variable one goes up from there.

Having the variable length guards is great as it reduces the number of guards you need and allows you to change lengths on the fly.

Using the shears without the guard is also good for trimming to the skinline, edging and shaping.

The only complaint my wife had is that she wishes it were a little more powerful on battery, but wasn't really lacking in power, it is just that she usually uses professional shears. This unit is actually as powerful or more powerful than most shears you buy at walmart or the like.

Overall a great shear for home hair cutting.

This is a great way to trim your beard. A definite step up from traditional trimmers. The magic in it is the vacuum that captures and stores trimmed beard and mustache hair instead of letting it fall into your sink to make a mess. You don't make your lady mad, and everyone is happy.

The trimmer itself fits comfortably in your hand. It has an detachable cord that allows the unit to be charged. It can operate on the cord or off it's batteries for cordless use. The trimmer is NOT submersible.

The attached guard can be adjusted to 9 length settings with a rotating selector. It can also be taken off for trimming necklines or other areas. There is also a separate smaller attachment that can be used for precision cuts.

The vacuum is power and made more powerful over earlier models through the use of the "Turbo" button that amps up the cutting power and vacuum power substantially. When you are done cutting your hairs are captured in a removable tray for disposal. There are still a few hairs that don't get sucked up but it a huge improvement over using trimmers without suction.

The only negatives are that the hair capture cup is a tad small. There is also a plastic piece that guides hair into the cup that makes neck and cheek-line trimming a little tricky until you get the hang of it.

Overall a great trimmer for those of us real men with beards. A must have!!

This is a very good product for those of us who want to have fun with enhancing skimpy eyelashes.  There are some excellent mascaras available, but for pizzazz you can't beat false eyelashes.  The only problem, and this isn't a huge one, is that the strip that on which you apply the adhesive is very very thin and flexible.  This makes it hard to apply the adhesive evenly and to achieve a strong hold.  With practice this becomes less of a problem.  The scissors are nice, not spectacular and not very sharp; but a nice addition.  All in all a good buy and great for us makeup artists or rather those of us who would like to be.

While a little pricey this conditioner is worth every penny.  I have had to wear wigs for twenty years and always on the lookout for good products to keep my wigs looking good.  This is my absolute favorite to date.  Only thing that went wrong was that the product arrived having leaked into the packaging.  A messy gooey mess and the loss of product.  To keep your wigs looking good I strongly recommend this conditioner.  A plus is that it has a very pleasant scent.

I wanted this to work with my hair style so badly!  I've always wanted to wear a crown for an event.  It was gorgeous and high quality.  I did end up returning it, but it was because of my hair, not the crown itself--it was perfect!
I’ve tried many similar sized bottles and caps on these are great. They seem sturdier.

I used to buy this all the time in the stores, but it is hard to find lately. So glad I found it on Amazon!

If you've never used it before, it is a very pretty nailpolish that appears to change colors in the sunlight. I recommend using a layer or two over any base color, because it does come on pretty light and adding a base coat can really change the full effect. There are many colors available to choose from, and this one changes from a light green-ish color to a purplish shade.

Enjoy!

I really wanted this product to work. I have used it as directly for over a month and unfortunately it did not get rid of my blackheads or reduced the size of my pores. It does leave the skin soft and clean which is why I kept it, but the blackheads remained. So far, the only thing that has helped me keep those annoying blackheads off my nose is extraction.
As advertised. Needed for hand sani to put on my uniform. No leaving or breakage. The zippy thing and carabiner were handy. Good price

I like that these don’t squeeze my head. Soft velvet and plastic on underside with teeth. I bought set of black braided ones and also the jewel tone set. Eventually the ribbons on the ends of the black ones came undone. They need to do something about that.

Please bring back the set of black velvet ones.

OK now let me say these are very good for filing/nail shaping. As for buffering, if ur not careful, they'll buffer ur natural nail right off! Perhaps I missed it but I think these are meant for acrylic not natural nails. 2 sides are extremely coarse, on is better for buffering natural nails and the 4th side is for polishing after buffering. I'll have 2 continue my search.

This is a real review from someone that had an eye issue from left sides paralysis.  This helped me so much.  It was comfortable to wear all day and I even wore it at night.  If you need to wear something to protect your eye, I highly recommend this product.
Looks great. Purchased as gift, but wish it were for myself!!!
I love intense vibrant colors. Drab is dead.  It's too hot & humid here for eye shadow but great for eyeliner & fun colored mascara!
I guess red heads are too rich in natural color for these.  But my niece & my mother will enjoy.
Creativity
Damaged dry hair? This will bring it back to life!!!
Feet are super sticky.

At firstbi though the color was terrible but i didnt shake it well enough. So make sure to shake it well before using it. It does go with my skin color and i like it doesnt have strong odor. It also covers some of my face imperfections. Works good as a primer for me.

This wig is going to be great to dress up as winnie from hocus pocus. Even though it doest cover my sude good enought it is still a good wig. The 2 clips stay on pretty good. And it comes with the accesories, love it.
Even though i dont like scented lotions that much this one is good. The scent it has is very nice. I can take this in my bag  and it does moisturizes my hand plus it leaves them smelling good.

These are actually pretty nice and a good size to use on nails. Also great for my art projets, i like to paint with acrylic paint so these will look great on my art. smell nice. Unisex.

I did not like the individual packaging they didn’t really take down my swollen under eye bags and they were packaged separately and hard to get out of there a little packaging so I will not buy this againDid not like them. Also split upon application which is bad for an under eyepatch
I am loving this product so far. It takes some getting used to and it isn’t quite as moisturizing, but it does keep my skin looking good. The cardboard tube can be composed when I am done!

There is a lot to like about these bobby pins. They are sturdy and come in multiple colors. They are pointed uniformly and seem to hold my hair well. Only issue I had was that they seem to grab my hair more than the drugstore brand ones that I am used to. Overall I think that more hair will get pulled out with these pins than my old ones.

This deodorant has a very strong lavender scent (which is a plus for me!) It went on smooth, though it was difficult to get the plastic cover off of the stick for the first time. It did a surprisingly good job of keeping odors to a minimum, even in the middle of running errands in the heat of summer. Overall I was very impressed with this product.

This is a really fun facial kit, and Lord knows that the way things have gone with covid we could all use more fun in our lives! This would be a perfect kit to send to your friends and have a spa day over zoom. It has everything you need to feel pampered and it is super affordable!
The shaver is sharpe and shaves closely, making for a nice shave. It does not have the most sturdy or well built feel to it as it is all plastic, but it will be a good shaver for traveling with.
Biore delivers again. I am very happy with its cleaning power. Not sure how much this will sell for, but I’d be willing pay about $6 for this.
Great nail polish. It contains acetone.
I don't really use this for my skin great for crafts and the little that's got on my skin made the areas soft

This was so inexpensive that I assumed it would be poor quality. Wow! Really nice and well made!! Bought one for my daughter who played a “Princess” at a birthday party and one for the birthday girl. Big hit!!
Compact.  Lights could have been brighter but overall good quality.
Good price, great file.
Very happy with the purchase for this price. I am sure there are much more high quality brushes out there but on a budget this works.

I got the retro red. It is a little bright but it is a nice color. Applied carefully, it looks nice on a light olive complexion. The lipstick is creamy but just enough to cover smoothly. It hasn't dried my lips so far.

This is a great little gadget for cleaning dust and crumbs. It has a plus, a tube for spot cleaning. The suction is not very strong but is enough to do the job. The gray is a nice neutral color and should fit most decor.

This is my first attempt at DIY lip gloss. I wanted something that was more moisturizing and in a color I wanted. The base blended well with oils, food grade mica and flavoring. I made a neutral tint with a touch of gold for shimmer. It feels nice on my lips. The gloss did not feel heavy and stayed on my lips. However, the mica color might be richer in clear rather than white. Overall, I am satisfied with my first attempt but I will order clear.

If you have the patience to put these in and take them out carefully, then it is worth the extra time. This between a wig and a weave. The glue tabs are not bulky and can add volume to thin hair when layered. You will need more than one package for full coverage. I got these to fill out thinning hair. A wig is sometimes too hot to wear and a weave can be too painful. I can put these in and take them out when I am ready. There are plenty of videos about this. I got both off black and dark brown to match my hair color. This can be a fun way to get more fullness without spending hundreds of dollars.

I bought the wrong product as I wanted nail lacquer and not gel. However, the colors are very pretty and I have a nail gel lamp, so I will keep them. My bottles have samples of the colors on the front. I have not tried them yet, but I hope they are as pretty as the photo.
Very nice palette but some of the colors did not survive shipping. The stay on well with eye primer. I need apply only once and they last all day.

My clients absolutely love these lashes. It can look so soft but yet can easily be made into a more dramatic LOOK! It's slightly longer than I expected but I am so pleased because its more spaced out gives it a natural look - stack 2 lashes & I promise you you'll love it if you're a drama girl. These are great for the price. May be on the small side if you have super long hair but fits great on my thick shoulder length. Am buying another set for my mother.
